articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Munchon Secondary School
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Munchon Secondary School
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to Munchon Secondary School honored with the title of thrice red flag in the city of Munchon.
					 Kim Jong Il paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school before looking round the room devoted to the history of the school.
					
					The school has lots of relics that bear witness to revolutionary activities of the President. He visited the school on October 22, 1953 right after the ceasefire and personally chose the site for the new school building.
					
					 Kim Jong Il noted that the school built before any other buildings on debris after the war has developed into the nation's leading model school under the meticulous care of the President.  
					
					 He went round the computer room, the room for the study of teaching methods, the bio-laboratory and other places to acquaint himself in detail with the education and upbringing there.  
					
					 Saying that the education of the rising generation is an important affair on which hinges the rise or fall of the country and an important requirement for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, he advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for the education and upbringing at the school. 
					
					 It is the primary task of the students to be good at study, he noted, underlining the need for the schools to train the younger generation into persons of talent fully capable of contributing to the accomplishment of the cause of building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He also underscored the need for the schools to help the students fully acquire general secondary knowledge during the secondary school days and intensify the computer education from the phases of primary and secondary education so that they may make a satisfactory use of computers while at school.
					
					  He said that a teacher is not only directly responsible for the education but a professional revolutionary who performs an honorable task for training the rising generation as successors to the revolution.  
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the teachers of the school would steadily improve the contents of the education as required by the daily rising cultural and technological level of the society and thus register greater successes in the education of the younger generation. He gave a lot of educational equipment to the school as gifts.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, and leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Secretary General Leong Wai Meng and executive members of the International Martial Arts Games Committee and delegates of Germany, Singapore, Australia, Iran, the Czech Republic, Thailand and Taipei of China came here today by air to participate in the celebrations of the 10th anniversary of the International Martial Arts Games Committee.
					 Arriving earlier were delegates of Mongolia and Estonia.

articles.title: Drama "Sentry under a Neon Lamp" under Performance in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Drama "Sentry under a Neon Lamp" under Performance in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The drama "Sentry under a Neon Lamp" has been staged in Pyongyang nowadays following its successful performances at the Hamhung Grand Theatre.
					 The number of the theatre-goers has reached tens of thousands up to now since its first performance.
					
					 The drama was created and performed in China in the early 1960s. Through the artistic depiction of a company of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, it shows the lesson that if people are infected with "sweet wind" of capitalism they cannot defend the already-won revolution and the truth of the history that in order to make revolution, they should have a thoroughgoing class consciousness and should not lay down the weapon of class struggle.
					
					 The translated drama was created and staged in Korea about half a century ago.
					
					 The State Theatrical Troupe represented the drama this "Year of DPRK-China Friendship".
					
					 The performance is greatly influential in moving the audience for its marked individuality, truthful representation, a high level of narration art, formation of newly created scenes surpassing the original work and stage decor.
					
					 Kim Yong Il, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said: The drama implants in our mind the idea that only when the rifle is heartily taken on the basis of firm ideology and faith, can it serve as the weapon of the revolution.
					
					 Ko Yong Ul, a researcher of the Hamhung Branch Academy of the State Academy of Sciences, remarked that the drama is good not only for the servicepersons but also for the intellectuals in making their class consciousness and will unshakable.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol, a worker of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, stressed that through the drama, he clearly realized the fact that if the workers are deprived of the DPRK, the cradle of the genuine life and happiness, they will be reduced again to miserable "speaking tools" for the exploiting class, far from being a strong pillar of the country.

articles.title: Relics of "Rakta Bridge" Discovered
articles.content:
Relics of "Rakta Bridge" Discovered
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Relics of "Rakta (camel)Bridge" were excavated in Korea. The bridge was the oldest one built in the period of Koryo across the small river called Ochon. The river is flowing between Kwanhun-dong and Poson-dong of Kaesong City.
					 The stone bridge supported by pillars was 30 meters long, 6 meters wide and 1.7 meters high.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists destroyed the foundation and pillar stones and other parts of the bridge at random in 1935.
					
					 Discovered there are four broken foundation stones, one pillar stone, one broken beam stone and stones supporting foundation stones on the bed of the river.
					
					 A square flute for pillar was made in the center of the upper surface of the foundation stone. The flute is 45 centimeters long, 40 centimeters wide and 5 to 10 centimeters deep.
					
					 The pillar stone is 130cm long, 43-46cm wide on the top and 47-60cm wide at the bottom and has a jaw at the bottom to be dovetailed in the square flute of the foundation stone. 
					
					 The upper side of the broken beam stone lying on two pillars was worn to smooth.
					
					 Those supporting the foundation stones are rectangular plain rocks of different sizes.
					
					 Pieces of inlaid ceramics of Koryo and ceramics of Ri Dynasty and various iron nails were also found out there.
					
					 The relics of "Rakta Bridge" which was built over 1,000 years ago are of weighty significance in studying the bridge architecture in the early period of Koryo and show the Korean people's stone processing technique and high bridge architecture.

articles.title: Korea Jangsaeng J.V. Company
articles.content:
Korea Jangsaeng J.V. Company
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Korea Jangsaeng J.V. Company is a DPRK's famous production base of Koryo medicine and health foods.
					 It, located in Taedonggang District of Pyongyang, meets the requirements of GMP in all aspects of environment, sanitation, building, products examination. It has an integral production process.
					
					 The production base is sufficiently equipped with modern pharmaceutical facilities.
					
					 It produces scores of kinds of Koryo medicines with secret recipes for old elixirs of life as intellectual source and with rare medicinal animals and plants growing in deep forests.
					
					 The demand for its products is on increase for their best quality and high efficacy.
					
					 In particular Kumin pill, Pibior-1 injection, Tetradocane injection, Kumdang-2 injection and others are highly favored by local and foreign users.
					
					 It also manufactures blueberry extract, insam extract, ginkgo leaf tincture, Tuchung hypertension tincture, mulberry leave pill, various kinds of tea and other natural Koryo health foodstuffs and ginkgo leaf liquor, Scolopendra mulitans liquor, Fructus Schizandrae liquor, deer-bone liquor and other medicinal liquors.
					
					 The company, with its powerful technical group, is supported by authoritative scholars in the fields of pharmacology, medicine, biology and chemistry.

articles.title: KCNA Slashes at Japan's Moves to Establish MDS
articles.content:
KCNA Slashes at Japan's Moves to Establish MDS
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Japan is frantically stepping up its moves to establish the missile defence system (MDS).
					 The Ministry of Defense of Japan on August 15 decided to deploy an expanded network of PAC-3 capable of intercepting ballistic missiles from the ground throughout the country. According to this decision, PAC-3s will be deployed at six anti-air units of the Air Self-Defence Force after modifying the plan to deploy them at its three anti-air units. Right after the decision was announced, the ministry made it clear on August 21 that it formally deployed PAC-3 in the ASDF base in Gifu Prefecture.
					
					 The Japanese authorities claimed this was taken to cope with the "missile threat" from the DPRK. This is, however, nothing but sophism to hide the offensive and aggressive nature of the action. 
					
					 The above-said military step taken by the Japanese reactionaries indicates that their preparations for reinvasion are being stepped with increased zeal under the scenario for preemptive attack.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the said decision was made on the basis of the theories of "acquiring capability to attack enemy bases" and "mounting a preemptive nuclear attack".
					
					 Japan has already deployed spy satellites for the purpose of detecting targets of preemptive attack in space. It is, at the same time, hastening the introduction of an early warning satellite for the MDS.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are busy stepping up the preparations for preemptive attack in all aspects ranging from detecting targets to attack and defence. This is increasing the danger of war in Northeast Asia and escalating the military tension there. There is no knowing about when Japan will start reinvasion to realize its wild ambition for overseas expansion. 
					
					 The above-mentioned military decision is aimed at securing a military strategic edge over the neighboring powers while rounding off the preparations for a preemptive attack. 
					
					 Japan is getting evermore undisguised in its moves to emerge a military giant, posing an ever-increasing military threat to the countries in the region and the international community. This reveals its invariable militarist ambition to become the "leader of Asia" and realize the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries are seriously mistaken.
					
					 Asia today is not what it used to be in the past. The international community is following with vigilance the frenzied moves of Japan to launch reinvasion under the pretext of "threat" from others. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better stop their rash acts.

articles.title: Struggle for Creating Peaceful Environment Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Creating Peaceful Environment Called for
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- To create a peaceful environment is one of the most important tasks before the progressive countries to achieve development in the new century.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Without a struggle for creating a peaceful environment a people can neither achieve the goals of socio-economic development in the new century nor protect the sovereignty of their country.
					
					 The above-said struggle is not a task facing specified countries but a task common to all the countries desirous of development in the new century, setting store by their sovereignty.
					
					 What is important in the above-said struggle at present is to properly know about the essence of the changed aggressive methods of the imperialists and take a principled approach towards them.
					
					 Peace should serve the purpose of promoting harmony and friendship among countries and nations and boosting cooperation among them in the true sense of the word.
					
					 Peace never comes of its own accord but it can be achieved only through the struggle against the phenomena opposed to it.
					
					 The struggle for creating a peaceful environment is, in essence, an anti-imperialist, anti-war struggle.
					
					 Individual countries are not strong enough to wage a successful struggle against the allied imperialist forces. When the peace-loving countries solidarize with each other and pool efforts, they can grow a hundred times stronger.
					
					 More favorable environment and conditions will be created for the socio-economic development in the new century when the peoples of the progressive countries advance, holding aloft the banner of the above-said struggle.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- In order to achieve the reunification and prosperity of the Korean nation it is important to steadily adhere to the principle of solving any problem arising in the realization of national reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans responsible for it. And all Koreans in the north and the south should get firmly united and intensify the struggle to implement the inter-Korean declarations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 National independence is the core and basic principle for solving the reunification question, the national problem, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 "By our nation itself" is the idea of national independence, the patriotic idea common to the nation that should be entirely relied on for national reconciliation and unity and development of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Anyone who truly wants national reconciliation, unity and reunification should maintain the principle of national independence.
					
					 The signal achievements made in the inter-Korean relations in the June 15 era of reunification prove that the inter-Korean declarations are the most just and vital, immortal great programmes for national reunification and that the Koreans can surely achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity when they pool their efforts on the basis of the joint declarations.
					
					 There can be no discrimination between government and non-government nor limitation by affiliations and status in implementing the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should become defender and implementer of the joint declarations with responsibility for their implementation, transcending differences in ideology and system.

articles.title: Cuban People's Just Cause Supported
articles.content:
Cuban People's Just Cause Supported
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean people send militant salute to the fraternal Cuban people standing firm guard over the socialist post in the Western Hemisphere on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean people have extended full support and solidarity to the friendly Cuban people who have dynamically advanced along the path of socialism chosen by themselves while foiling all the ceaseless moves of the U.S. to launch aggression and isolate and stifle them.
					
					 The Cuban people have devotedly struggled to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and socialism and successfully push forward the revolution and construction under the correct leadership of Fidel Castro and Raul Castro.
					
					 The Cuban party and government are channeling great efforts into bolstering up the defence capability in order to reliably protect the revolutionary gains won at the cost of blood from the U.S. imperialists' aggression. The combat capability of the Cuban army is daily growing stronger and fresh achievements have been made in the socialist economic construction and the socialist cultural construction. 
					
					 The successful progress made in the revolution and construction of Cuba is the fruition of the devoted struggle waged by the party, government and people of Cuba.
					
					 The just cause of the Cuban people is sure to triumph, concludes the article.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
articles.content:
Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the August magazine "Paektu-Halla." 
					Carried in the magazine are a photograph of General Secretary Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the construction site of Taegyedo tideland and a congratulatory letter the association sent to him on the occasion of July 27, the day of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The magazine in articles titled "Leading the final offensive for liberating the country to a victory" and "Historic August 25, which marked the beginning of the immortal history of carrying forward the Songun cause" refers to the judiciousness and validity of the Songun revolutionary leadership of the peerlessly great persons. 
					
					 The magazine conveys news that the association and its affiliated organizations placed floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Jilin Yuwen Middle School on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise and held a meeting to remember him. 
					
					  It also carries a statement titled "The immortal exploits performed by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung will shine forever thanks to the great brilliant commander of Songun" issued by Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the association, and articles.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked 
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars, Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Russia, Germany, Ethiopia, Nigeria and Mongolia between August 18 and 26 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on their immortal Songun revolutionary leadership exploits, photos on the invincible might of the Korean People's Army and the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation, publications introducing the advantages of the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and handicrafts showcasing the wisdom and skills of Koreans. 
					
					 Speakers at the events recalled that Kim Jong Il established the Songun political mode by successfully embodying the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung, thereby developing the KPA into an invincible army and dynamically pushing ahead with the overall socialist construction with the KPA as the mainstay. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films such as "Reply of Korea" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea." 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the function in Germany.

articles.title: ATCC comenta ambicion de Japon de implantar sistema antimissiles
articles.content:
ATCC comenta ambicion de Japon de implantar sistema antimisiles
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, Japon recurre con mas fanatismo al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles.
					El Ministerio de Defensa de Japon decidio el dia 15 desplegar a lo largo y ancho del pais los misiles "PAC-3", que interceptan desde la tierra el misil balistico.
					
					Segun ello, los "PAC-3" seran emplazados en 6 unidades antiaereas de las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" al enmendarse el plan anterior que preveia colocarlos en solo 3 unidades.
					
					El dia 21, a menos de una semana desde la adopcion de tal decision, esa cartera anuncio que ya ha emplazado los "PAC-3" en la base de las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" en el departamento de Kifu.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas justifican que tales acciones militares son necesarias para hacer frente a la "amenaza de misil" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Pero esto no pasa de ser una sofisteria para encubrir el caracter ofensivo y agresivo de sus maniobras para establecer el sistema antimisiles.
					
					Los apresurados movimientos de los reaccionarios japoneses para extenderlo a todo el pais muestran que sus preparativos para la nueva agresion marchan a ritmo acelerado persiguiendo la meta de ataque preventivo.
					
					No es casual que la senalada decision fuera la continuacion de las teorias de "posesion de la capacidad de ataque a las bases enemigas" y "ataque nuclear preventivo".
					
					Japon lanzo ya al espacio los satelites de reconocimiento para espiar y definir los blancos de su ataque preventivo y acelera ahora la introduccion del satelite de alerta previa, considerado como "ojo" del sistema antimisiles.
					
					Debido a estos preparativos de ataque preventivo que preven hasta los quehaceres de defensa, se agranda en el Nordeste Asiatico el peligro de la guerra y se agrava la tension militar. 
					
					Nadie sabe en que momento Japon, enloquecido por la expansion a ultramar, desencadenara la guerra para agredir de nuevo el continente asiatico.
					
					Otra meta de Japon es tomar la superioridad militar y estrategica sobre las potencias circunvecinas.
					
					Partiendo de su empecinada ambicion militarista de establecer la "Esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia oriental" siendo el "senor de Asia", Japon se mueve abiertamente para convertirse en una potencia militar e intensifica mas que nunca la amenaza militar a los paises regionales y la sociedad internacional.
					
					Pero, estan muy equivocados los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Asia de hoy no es la de ayer. La sociedad internacional observa con alta vigilancia los bulliciosos movimientos de Japon que afila el sable de reagresion acusando a otros.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun apoya la justa causa del pueblo cubano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun apoya la justa causa del pueblo cubano
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ATCC) -- En el articulo individual difundido este sabado con motivo del 49o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y Cuba, el diario Rodong Sinmun envio el saludo combativo al hermano pueblo cubano que defiende con firmeza la trinchera del socialismo en el hemisferio occidental del orbe.
					En el pasado, el pueblo coreano ha enviado su apoyo total y firme solidaridad a la lucha del amistoso pueblo cubano que marcha sin vacilacion alguna por la senda del socialismo optada por si mismo frustrando paso a paso las incesantes maniobras de Estados Unidos para agredir, aislar y atropellar a la Mayor de las Antillas, senala el articulista y prosigue:
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo cubano lucha abnegadamente por defender firmemente la soberania del pais y el socialismo e impulsar con exito la revolucion y la construccion bajo la acertada direccion de los estimados companeros Fidel Castro y Raul Castro.
					
					El partido y el gobierno cubanos prestan gran atencion al fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional para salvaguardar con lealtad de la agresion del imperialismo yanqui las conquistas de la revolucion alcanzadas a costa de sangre.
					
					Como resultado, se incrementa cada dia mas la combatividad del ejercito cubano y se logran nuevos exitos en la construccion economica y cultural del socialismo.
					
					La marcha exitosa de la revolucion y la construccion en Cuba es el resultado de la lucha abnegada del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de este pais caribeno.
					
					Triunfara sin falta la justa causa del pueblo cubano.

articles.title: Compania Comanditaria Jangsaeng de Corea
articles.content:
Compania Comanditaria Jangsaeng de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ATCC) -- La Compania Comanditaria Jangsaeng de Corea es una de las bases de elaboracion de famosas medicinas tradicionales de Corea y los alimentos saludables. 
					La compania situada en el capitalino municipio de Taedonggang tiene el acabado proceso de produccion y conviene al GMP en el ambiente, higiene, edificio, control de calidad de productos, etc.
					
					La base de produccion esta acondicionada conforme al standard internacional y dispone de  los modernos equipos farmaceuticos. 
					
					La compania produce decenas de medicinas tradicionales tomando por fuente intelectual las recetas secretas de los medicamentos tradicionales para la longevidad, y por materias primas los animales y vegetales raros de uso medicinal que viven y crecen en el monte Kumgang, el Myohyang, el Oga y otras selvas virgenes. 
					
					Crece cada dia mas la demanda de los productos por su maxima calidad y eficiencia. 
					
					En particular, ganan mucha atraccion de los compradores del interior y exterior la pildora Kumin, la inyeccion Pibior-1, la Tetrodocane, la Kumdang-2 y otras medicinas.
					
					Ademas, se producen los extractos de arandano y ginseng, la tintura de hojas de gingko anti-arteriosclerosis, la tintura de Tuchung (Eucommia ulmoides) anti-hipertension, la pildora de hojas de moral, los tes, los alimentos  saludables y los licores medicinales elaborados con las hojas de gingko, ciempies grande, toronjil, huesos de ciervos, etc.
					
					La compania tiene un colectivo de tecnicos competentes y recibe el apoyo de los cientificos prestigiosos de ramas de farmacologia, medicina, biologia y quimica.

articles.title: Prosigue en Pyongyang la funcion de "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon"
articles.content:
Prosigue en Pyongyang la funcion de "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon"
  Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ATCC) -- La funcion del drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon", que resulto un exito en el Gran Teatro de Hamhung, se ofrece ahora en Pyongyang.
					  Desde el estreno hasta la fecha, lo disfrutaron decenas de miles de personas.
					
					  Mediante los sucesos en el seno de una compania del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China, esa obra creada y llevada a la escena a principios de la decada de 1960 en China muestra de manera artistica la leccion de que si se contagia con la corriente rosada del capitalismo, no se puede defender la revolucion triunfada y la verdad de la historia de que para hacer la revolucion, hay que poseer la firme conciencia clasista y no deponer jamas el arma de la lucha clasista.
					
					  El drama fue interpretado en Corea hace cerca de medio siglo en el idioma coreano.
					
					  El Conjunto Dramatico Nacional lo ha readaptado este "Ano de Amistad Corea-China".
					
					  Conmueve mucho al publico esta pieza gracias a la actuacion peculiar y sincera y el gran arte de hablar de los actores y a la escenografia original y fresca que supera la de la obra original.
					
					  El oficial del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Yong Il, enfatizo que el drama ensena que el fusil puede ser la verdadera arma de la revolucion cuando lo empunen no con la mano sino con el corazon partiendo de la firme idea y conviccion.
					
					  El investigador de la Sucursal de Hamhung de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Ko Yong Ul, dijo que esta funcion tan buena hace redoblar la conciencia y disposicion clasistas no solo a los militares sino tambien a los intelectuales.
					
					  El obrero del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, Kim Yong Chol, apunto que el drama le hizo saber una vez mas que si pierde a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, cuna de la verdadera vida y felicidad, correria otra vez el tragico destino de "aparato hablador" de la clase explotadora, lejos de ser el pilar del pais.
